name: King Arthur (itch) (Amellyne)
description:
Can you help Arthur rescue the sword in the stone? Enter the world of Camelot and partake in an ancient medieval quest in this 2D adventure! We can already hear what you are saying and sure, we did take some artistic license with the story, and yes it is clear that none of the 5 designers could actually agree on an art style....

But King Arthur will delight all ages with it's easy to follow system and simple controls, yes we know he looks a little 'different' when he moves.... Also yes, we know real gamers don't like using the arrow keys to move, but that is fine... right? 

Other fantastic features of this game include music... oh wait, nobody was assigned to that bit, so um, just hum the theme song from chariots of fire whilst you play....We might eventually get someone to fix that..

Well, this game really is crap, so ah... enjoy this delightful entry into this year's crap game jam!

Created by USC Serious Game Students using Construct 2,  for entrance into the crap game jam.
